report.description: Bicycle stolen from apartment complex parking area. Suspect seen fleeing on foot towards main street.

victims.name: John Smith
victims.description: Resident of the apartment complex, bicycle owner

suspects.name: Unknown male suspect
suspects.description: Tall, wearing dark hoodie and jeans, approximately 6 feet tall, medium build

witnesses.name: Maria Garcia
witnesses.description: Neighbor who saw suspect running away from parking area
